page.title: 10CHURCHES IN SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: There are four{churches}in this area St. Wilfrid{Church of England,}Elim {Pentecostal}Church, a{Methodist}Church and a{Baptist}Church. {St.Wilfrid Church of England Church}is seventy-five years old and was built in its present position as the population grew to the west of the town.It can hold three to four hundred people and at present it has three hundred members.It has a{Sunday {school}which is attended by about thirty to forty children.Each year twenty-five to forty people are christened,twenty couples are married and there are thirty funeral services. The{Baptist Church}is forty years old. It has a{Sunday School}which is attended by about fifty children. During the week it is used as a playschool.
